column1: #Text=We have n't decided if you passed your firebending test yet .
#Text=" White Lotus leader says : " Ever since you were a little girl , you 've excelled at the physical side of bending , but completely ignored the spiritual side .
#Text=" Korra says : " I have n't ignored it , it just does n't come as easy to me .
#Text=But that 's why I should start training with Tenzin immediately .
